EmailTemplate.description: Template para notificar al equipo de tesorería que el takedown está en proceso de aprobación con AP
EmailTemplate.name: TKD_AP_Submit_Approval_To_Tesorery
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" in {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} stage need approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} in {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} stage is waiting for Approval.
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engen Capital.
